https://tmrev.io/movie/876536-Coloured Light District 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/g3C3zXVRpJK5SHpKBiDdOcpj8Co.jpg Derived from found super-8 footage of night-time cityscapes shot in London and Berlin in the early 1970s, this once-silent amateur film of lights and neon signs has been reorganized through editing, superimposition and colour inversion, with Helliwell's soundtrack combining electronics, computer sounds and short wave radio signals. Coloured Light District
